text: "I Wish it Could Be Christmas Everyday" is a Christmas song. It was first sung by the British glam rock group Wizzard. It was first released in December 1973. The song was at #4 on the United Kingdom Singles Chart in December 1973 and January 1974. Other singers of the Christmas song include Wilson Phillips, the Spice Girls and the Monkees. ==References== Category:Christmas songs Category:1973 songs Category:Spice Girls songs Category:Wilson Phillips songs Category:Kylie Minogue songs Category:Girls Aloud songs Category:Blue (group) songs Category:B*Witched Category:Atomic Kitten Category:Leona Lewis songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: I Wish It Could Be Christmas Everyday
